qas.question: What type of geologists give information about strain within the crystalline structure of the rocks?
How do structural geologists observe the fabric within the rocks?

answers.text: microscopic analysis of oriented thin sections
use microscopic analysis of oriented thin sections of geologic samples

qas.question: In order to better understand the orientations of faults and folds, structural geologists do what with measurements of geological structures?
What kind of experiments of rock deformation do structural geologists perform?
In what setting do structural geologists reconstruct the crystalline structure of rocks?
What experiments are used to reconstruct rock fabric?

plausible_answers.text: to observe the fabric within the rocks

qas.question: Why do geologists plot crystals under a microscope?
What information does history of rock deformation give about crystal structure?
What do structural geologists do with measurements of fabric in crystals?

plausible_answers.text: strain within the crystalline structure of the rocks

qas.question: What does the orientation of the thin sections tell geologists?
How do geologists identify the measurements of a geological structure?

plausible_answers.text: the orientations of faults and folds

qas.question: What does the deformation of a rock tell geologists?
What experiment can be performed on large settings that cannot be on small settings?
What instrument is used to perform analogy and numerical experiments?
